style_profile.visual_theme: Combines a dark, high-contrast background with vibrant, fluid, and geometric abstract graphics. The look is corporate but with a creative and forward-thinking edge.

primary.name: Dark Navy
primary.description: The dominant background color for most sections.

secondary.name: Mid-to-Bright Blue
secondary.description: Used for hero sections and sometimes as an overlay or background for specific content blocks.

text.name: White & Light Gray
text.description: Used for primary and secondary text to provide strong contrast against the dark backgrounds.

accents.name: Vibrant Spectrum
accents.description: A wide range of bright, abstract colors (pinks, purples, oranges, blues) used exclusively within the dynamic graphic elements.

headline_font.usage: Large, bold headlines in hero sections and as main section titles.

body_font.usage: Standard text for paragraphs, subheadings, navigation, and component descriptions.

grid_system.description: Content is organized into distinct sections with consistent horizontal padding. It utilizes both two-column (text and image) and three-column layouts for content cards.

hierarchy.description: A clear visual hierarchy with prominent hero sections, followed by content-rich sections with cards and text blocks.

common_patterns: Full-width hero sections with a headline and subtext.
Two-column layouts with a text block on the left and a large visual on the right.
Three-column grid for showcasing multiple related content items (cards).

spacing.description: Generous vertical and horizontal spacing to create a clean, uncluttered feel.

card.description: A container for content with a visual element, a title, and descriptive text.

visuals.hover_state: A light blue or white border outline appears on hover, giving a 'selected' effect.

visuals.icon: An arrow icon pointing right is used inside the button or next to a text link.

text_link.description: Links within body text or titles.

visuals.icon: Accompanied by a smaller, right-pointing arrow icon.
